question: Which two cities will be connected under Indiaâ€™s first Defence Industrial Corridor Project as announced in Budget 2018?
explanation: In Budget 2018, the finance minister announced for two defence industrial corridors. Recently, the defence minister Nirmala Sitharaman unveiled the path for first of the two. The first defence industrial corridor will connect Chennai and Bengaluru and will pass through Coimbatore and several other industrial clusters.
